title: Solo Leveling
author: Chugong
synopsis: Sung Jin-woo, the weakest of all hunters, is granted the power to level up after a near-death experience, and becomes the strongest hunter.

title: The Breaker
author: Jeon Geuk-jin
synopsis: Shi-Woon, a bullied student, gets involved in the dangerous world of martial artists after learning powerful martial arts from his teacher.

title: Noblesse
author: Son Jae-ho
synopsis: A powerful vampire awakens after centuries and attends high school while protecting his friends from supernatural threats.

title: God of High School
author: Yongje Park
synopsis: Martial artists compete in a fighting tournament to uncover secrets involving ancient gods and supernatural powers.

title: Tower of God
author: SIU
synopsis: Twenty-Fifth Bam enters the mysterious Tower in search of his friend Rachel and uncovers powerful enemies and hidden truths.

title: The Beginning After the End
author: TurtleMe
synopsis: King Grey is reincarnated into a world filled with magic and beasts, where he must navigate danger and uncover dark secrets.

title: Hardcore Leveling Warrior
author: Kim Sehoon
synopsis: A once top-ranked player in a virtual reality game must fight his way back to the top after losing everything in a deadly battle.

title: The Gamer
author: Sung Sang-young
synopsis: A boy discovers that his life has become a video game, gaining the ability to level up and unlock new powers.

title: Omniscient Reader
author: Sing Shong
synopsis: Kim Dokja, the sole reader of an obscure web novel, suddenly finds himself in a world where the novelâ€™s events are playing out in real life.

title: Unordinary
author: Uru-chan
synopsis: In a world where everyone has powers, John Doe pretends to be powerless while hiding his past as one of the strongest fighters.
